title: Jew Süss
description: Based on the extraordinary exploits of a living figure, this international bestseller, set in 18th Century Germany, is the heroic story of Joseph Süss Oppenheimer.Feuchtwanger weaves a colorful tapestry as he intertwines an exciting historical period with vivid detail, sweeping drama, and full-blooded characters. We enter into the life of the times, into the intrigue of court life with its greed and lust. But this is also a highly personal story of one man's rise to power amongst the rapacious and the sensual and a father's choice that led to his tragic downfall.
author: Lion Feuchtwanger
